verses.verse: There was also a lot <WH1486> for the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh; <WH4519> for he was the firstborn <WH1060> of Joseph; <WH3130> to wit, for Machir <WH4353> the firstborn <WH1060> of Manasseh, <WH4519> the father <WH1> of Gilead: <WH1568> because <WH3588> he was a man <WH376> of war, <WH4421> therefore he had <WH1961> Gilead <WH1568> and Bashan. <WH1316>

There was also a lot for the rest <WH3498> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> by their families; <WH4940> for the children <WH1121> of Abiezer, <WH44> and for the children <WH1121> of Helek, <WH2507> and for the children <WH1121> of Asriel, <WH844> and for the children <WH1121> of Shechem, <WH7928> and for the children <WH1121> of Hepher, <WH2660> and for the children <WH1121> of Shemida: <WH8061> these <WH428> were the male <WH2145> children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> by their families. <WH4940>

But Zelophehad, <WH6765> the son <WH1121> of Hepher, <WH2660> the son <WH1121> of Gilead, <WH1568> the son <WH1121> of Machir, <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> had <WH1961> no <WH3808> sons, <WH1121> but daughters: <WH1323> and these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of his daughters, <WH1323> Mahlah, <WH4244> and Noah, <WH5270> Hoglah, <WH2295> Milcah, <WH4435> and Tirzah. <WH8656>

And they came <WH7126> near <WH7126> before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> and before <WH6440> Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and before <WH6440> the princes, <WH5387> saying, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> to give <WH5414> us an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> our brothers. <WH251> Therefore according <WH413> to the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> he gave <WH5414> them an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> the brothers <WH251> of their father. <WH1>

And there fell <WH5307> ten <WH6235> portions <WH2256> to Manasseh, <WH4519> beside <WH905> the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> and Bashan, <WH1316> which <WH834> were on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> Jordan; <WH3383>

Because <WH3588> the daughters <WH1323> of Manasseh <WH4519> had an inheritance <WH5157> among <WH8432> his sons: <WH1121> and the rest <WH3498> of Manasseh's <WH4519> sons <WH1121> had <WH1961> the land <WH776> of Gilead. <WH1568>

And the coast <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> was from Asher <WH836> to Michmethah, <WH4366> that lies before <WH5921> <WH6440> Shechem; <WH7927> and the border <WH1366> went <WH1980> along on <WH413> the right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Entappuah. <WH5887>
Now Manasseh <WH4519> had <WH1961> the land <WH776> of Tappuah: <WH8599> but Tappuah <WH8599> on <WH413> the border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> belonged to the children <WH1121> of Ephraim; <WH669>

And the coast <WH1366> descended <WH3381> to the river <WH5158> Kanah, <WH7071> southward <WH5045> of the river: <WH5158> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> of Ephraim <WH669> are among <WH8432> the cities <WH5892> of Manasseh: <WH4519> the coast <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> also was on the north <WH6828> side of the river, <WH5158> and the outgoings <WH8444> of it were at the sea: <WH3220>

Southward <WH5045> it was Ephraim's, <WH669> and northward <WH6828> it was Manasseh's, <WH4519> and the sea <WH3220> is his border; <WH1366> and they met <WH6293> together in Asher <WH836> on the north, <WH6828> and in Issachar <WH3485> on the east. <WH4217>

And Manasseh <WH4519> had <WH1961> in Issachar <WH3485> and in Asher <WH836> Bethshean <WH1052> and her towns, <WH1323> and Ibleam <WH2991> and her towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Dor <WH1756> and her towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Endor <WH5874> and her towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Taanach <WH8590> and her towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Megiddo <WH4023> and her towns, <WH1323> even three <WH7969> countries. <WH5316>

Yet the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> could <WH3201> not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants of those <WH428> cities; <WH5892> but the Canaanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in that land. <WH776>

Yet it came <WH1961> to pass, when <WH3588> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were waxen strong, <WH2388> that they put <WH5414> the Canaanites <WH3669> to tribute, <WH4522> but did not utterly drive <WH3423> them out.

And the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> spoke <WH1696> to Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559> Why <WH4069> have you given <WH5414> me but one <WH259> lot <WH1486> and one <WH259> portion <WH2256> to inherit, <WH5159> seeing I am a great <WH7227> people, <WH5971> for as much <WH5704> as the LORD <WH3068> has blessed <WH1288> me till now? <WH5704>

And Joshua <WH3091> answered <WH559> them, If <WH518> you be a great <WH7227> people, <WH5971> then get <WH5927> you up to the wood <WH3293> country, and cut <WH1254> down for yourself there <WH8033> in the land <WH776> of the Perizzites <WH6522> and of the giants, <WH7497> if <WH3588> mount <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669> be too narrow <WH213> for you.

And the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> said, <WH559> The hill <WH2022> is not enough <WH4672> for us: and all <WH3605> the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the valley <WH6010> have chariots <WH7393> of iron, <WH1270> both they who <WH834> are of Bethshean <WH1052> and her towns, <WH1323> and they who <WH834> are of the valley <WH6010> of Jezreel. <WH3157>

And Joshua <WH3091> spoke <WH559> to the house <WH1004> of Joseph, <WH3130> even to Ephraim <WH669> and to Manasseh, <WH4519> saying, <WH559> You are a great <WH7227> people, <WH5971> and have great <WH1419> power: <WH3581> you shall not have <WH1961> one <WH259> lot <WH1486> only:

But the mountain <WH2022> shall be yours; for it is a wood, <WH3293> and you shall cut <WH1254> it down: and the outgoings <WH8444> of it shall be yours: for you shall drive <WH3423> out the Canaanites, <WH3669> though <WH3588> they have iron <WH1270> chariots, <WH7393> and though <WH3588> they be strong. <WH2389>
